ow.routing.impl
クラス AbstractRoutingDriver

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.impl.AbstractRoutingDriver
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
RoutingRuntime, RoutingService
直系の既知のサブクラス:
IterativeRoutingDriver, RecursiveRoutingDriver
public abstract class AbstractRoutingDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoutingRuntime, RoutingService

The super class of all routing drivers. Two types of routing drivers corresponding to iterative and recursive lookup are provided as a subclass of this class.

関連項目:
IterativeRoutingDriver, RecursiveRoutingDriver

メソッドの詳細

routeToRootNode

public RoutingResult routeToRootNode(ID target,
                                     int numRootCandidates)
                              throws RoutingException
インタフェース RoutingService の記述:
Returns a route to the root node for the target.

定義:
インタフェース RoutingRuntime 内の routeToRootNode
定義:
インタフェース RoutingService 内の routeToRootNode
パラメータ:
target - target ID of routing
numRootCandidates - number of candidates for the root node to be returned
戻り値:
a route to / neighbors of the root node. The route includes the starting node itself.
例外:
RoutingException

routeToClosestNode

public RoutingResult routeToClosestNode(ID target,
                                        int numRootCandidates)
                                 throws RoutingException
定義:
インタフェース RoutingRuntime 内の routeToClosestNode
例外:
RoutingException

invokeCallbacksOnRoute

public RoutingResult invokeCallbacksOnRoute(ID target,
                                            int numRootCandidates,
                                            java.io.Serializable[] returnedValue,
                                            CallbackResultFilter filter,
                                            int tag,
                                            java.io.Serializable[] args)
                                     throws RoutingException
インタフェース RoutingService の記述:
Invokes callback method on nodes on the route for the specified target. On each node on the route callback are invoked with the specified arguments. This method returns a result of a callback on the root node.

定義:
インタフェース RoutingService 内の invokeCallbacksOnRoute
パラメータ:
target - target ID of routing
numRootCandidates - number of candidates for the root node which this call request
returnedValue - a value returned from a callback is stored at the head ([0]) of this array. null if no value found.
filter - a filter which judges a value returned from a callback is passed back to the caller.
tag - tag passed to callback
args - arguments passed to callback
戻り値:
a route to / neighbors of the root node. it includes this starting node itself.
例外:
RoutingException

leave

public void leave()
インタフェース RoutingService の記述:
Leaves the overlay. An instance of the routing algorithm is reset.

定義:
インタフェース RoutingService 内の leave

             throws java.io.IOException
